text.en: What is a variable in programming?
text.it: Che cos'è una variabile nella programmazione?

ideal_answer: A variable is a named memory location used to store data.

text.en: What are the main HTTP verbs?
text.fr: Quels sont les principaux verbes HTTP ?
text.it: Quali sono i principali verbi HTTP?

ideal_answer: GET, POST, PATCH, PUT, DELETE, HEAD, OPTIONS

text.en: What is the difference between a process and a thread?
text.es: ¿Cuál es la diferencia entre un proceso y un hilo?
text.fr: Quelle est la différence entre un processus et un thread ?
text.it: Qual è la differenza tra un processo e un thread?

ideal_answer: A process is an independent program with its own memory, while a thread is a lightweight unit of execution within a process.
